description: SubjectRulesReviewSpec adds information about how to conduct the check

groups.description: Groups is optional.  Groups is the list of groups to which the User belongs.  At least one of User and Groups must be specified.

scopes.description: Scopes to use for the evaluation.  Empty means "use the unscoped (full) permissions of the user/groups".

user.description: User is optional.  At least one of User and Groups must be specified.
